product_name: RockShox SID RCT3 Suspension Fork - 120mm Travel - 29" Wheel Size
long_description: Lightweight, sleek and capable of delivering a deadly blow to the competition, the RockShox SID RCT3 Suspension Fork offers excellent performance for your 29er on any type of off-road terrain.
